content:
#  Dormitories -- Department for International Students AGH 

URL: https://www.international.agh.edu.pl/en/dormitories
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:57

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Dormitories 

 22.11.2023 

AGH University has a modern and large student campus in Poland

Over 7,000 students live in 20 student dormitories. The AGH University Student Campus includes full infrastructure: shops, service points, post office, student clubs.

 22.11.2023 

Do you want to live here?

Register in the Central Dormitory Allocation System

Find more information at the 
AGH University Student Campus website
.

 22.11.2023 

415 PLN/month - the lowest dormitory rate in Krakow

with a relatively highest room standard.

 22.11.2023 

Free access to sport facilities

All our residents have
 free access
 to laundry and sport objects (volleyball court, basketball court, football field, gyms and tennis courts) reservations.

 22.11.2023 

10 minutes' walk from the Student Campus centre to the AGH Main Building

Dozens of tram and bus connections to every part of Krakow - everything is close when you live here.

Stopka

Career Centre

Diploma nostrification

Doctoral School

Main Library
